column1: Events that occurred on
==On Earth==
* 1904 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Father Francis Morgan.
* 1924 - Director Gene Deitch is born.
* 1925 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith (8 August 1925).
* 1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 139.
* 1981 - Mythcon 12 at wikipedia:Mills College in wikipedia:Oakland
* 1986 - Mythcon 17 at wikipedia:California State University in wikipedia:Long Beach
* 1994 - Mythcon 25 at wikipedia:American University
* 1995 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 6 is published.
* 1995 - Parma Eldalamberon issue Parma Eldalamberon 11 is published.
* 1997 - Mythcon 28 at wikipedia:Pepperdine University in wikipedia:Malibu
* 2002 - Tolkien Thing in wikipedia:Westerwald
* 2005 - http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Minya - 1st International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in wikipedia:Stockholm
* 2007 - http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Tatya - the 2nd International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in wikipedia:Antwerp
* 2009 - http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Nelya - 3rd International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in wikipedia:Whitehaven
* 2013 - Omentielva - 5th International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in Helsinki
* 2014 - Mythcon 45 in wikipedia:Wheaton College (Massachusetts)
* 2015 - Omentielva - Sixth International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in Greisinger Museum
==In Arda==
